title: COVID-19: Effect of temperature/humidity
description: COVID-19: Effect of temperature/humidity with visualizationThis kernel is inspired by the kernel COVID-19: Additional Statistics by @fanconic & @winterpierre91, which uses additional dataset to survey corona spread. Since it included global wheather information, I would like to focus on the relationship between wheather & corona to see if it has any effect or not. In conclusion, I could not find big relationship so far. In other words, corona's spread may not stop easily even though the global world temperature increases from April... [Note] weather information is until March 21, so this kernel investigates only until then. I might update this kernel to use daily updated wheather information if there's demand.
